timeline.bodyText: you just removed these in another instances, why add them here?
timeline.author: zohrehj

timeline.bodyText: same here, please address page == 0 case and test it.
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: we are using ngx-pagination plugin for pagination and the plugin gives page numbers from 1 to n ,0 can't be a page number here
replies.author: firdosebtc1

replies.bodyText: onSortBy and onOrderBy set the initial page as 0, which means this should also handle the case where page == 0, e.g. if user clicks on the first page on pagination footer.
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.message: code review comments has been resolved
